text: @senatemajldr @kilmeade You want the workers to come back to their, $7.50 an hour job, so they can serve you food. If they are afraid of getting sick or dying due to Coronavirus and don't work you take away their unemployment. You force the worker, worker gets sick, no one is liable. Bullshit.
